conversation: how do I open an account

Hi there, to open an account, you can visit any of our branches or apply online.

Would you like to know more about opening an account online or visiting a branch?
I want to open an account online

OK.

You can register with ING and open your ING Savings Account by using itsme®, downloading the ING Banking app or continuing in Home'Bank. You can then instantly access your new ING Savings Account in our digital channels and add your external reference account via the online form.
